rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about businesses being required to close during Covid-19, but it's not clear exactly how your request would work.
                
We have published a number of petitions calling on the Government to allow different types of business to reopen, which you might like to sign. You can view all open petitions relating to coronavirus here: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions?state=open&topic=covid-19
